name: LUCID DREAM (itch) (Ruman Kim)
description:
Have you ever met yourself in a dream?
Then you realize that all of you joined together.
That means when you hurt another you, it makes you get hurt at the same time. 
Can you turn off a lucid dream?
Find an alarm to make yourself wake up.

Controls
- Move with WASD
- Attack with E or Mouse left Click
- Dash with F

Credit
- Arts from GDM and Top-down Engine sample sources.
- Programmed by Minuk Hwang and Hyojin Kim.
